title: Anyone else just disconnect from the game?
body: Just disconnected from the game and can't reconnect, anyone else get this?

replies.body:
[This person posted just before you did.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/o1h15zgA-you-have-been-disconnected-by-the-internet-please-check-your-connection) Might have been better to just add on to that thread.

But anyway, what ISP and OS are you on? Can you provide more details about your disconnection, such as what you were doing (in-game, client, patching, connecting to a game)?
